text: Judith Stamm (25 February 1934 - 20 July 2022) was a Swiss jurist and politician. She was a member of the Christian Democratic People's Party (CVP). She was also a well known women's rights activist. Stamm was born in Schaffhausen, Switzerland. From 1983 to 1999, she was a member of the National Council. She was president of the council from 1996 to 1997. Stamm died on 20 July 2022 in Zurich, Switzerland at the age of 88.Judith Stamm, une ancienne présidente du Conseil national, est décédée ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Swiss politicians Category:Swiss lawyers Category:Human rights activists Category:People from Schaffhausen
title: Judith Stamm
